trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects to and from various other representations.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter> is used to evaluate and convert a property of an object into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class with the type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter> as an argument.

For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
You should never create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter> class.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you want to convert to.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
If `null` is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert the value parameter to.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Creates an instance of the type that this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> is associated with, using the specified context, given a set of property values for the object.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of new property values.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the given <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref>, or `null` if the object cannot be created.
This method always returns `null`.

Returns whether changing a value on this object requires a call to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> to create a new value, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

`true` if changing a property on this object requires a call to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> to create a new value; otherwise, `false`.
